= Introduction =
 * broadcasts when a tick is sent through telopts

= Help =
 {{{
/*
[FOR PLUGIN AUTHORS ONLY]

Detects when a tick is sent through telopts

Example:

  function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text)
    if id == "55567d873405332743347afc" and msg == 1 then
      -- do something on tick
    end
  end

*/
}}}

= Installation ==
 * download Nick's [http://www.gammon.com.au/mushclient/plugins/Aardwolf/telnet_options.lua telnet_options.lua] script into the directory <Mushclient Install Dir>\worlds\plugins\Aardwolf
 * download from trunk [http://code.google.com/p/bastmush/source/browse/trunk/worlds/plugins/Aardwolf/Tick_Detector.xml here] (make a note of the revision, it will help troubleshoot) or checkout with subversion and copy into the directory <Mushclient Install Dir>\worlds\plugins\Aardwolf
